section.heading: Reporting requirements.
section.text: Beginning December 1, 2014, the grant-managing entity shall submit a bimonthly report to the Council of all District funds allocated, which includes:

para.text: Performance measures and performance outcomes under each subgrant;
The specific services provided under each subgrant;
The entity providing the services, if one other than the subgrantee;
The time period of delivery of the services;
The actual amount paid for the services; and
The amount of other expenditures under the subgrant, if any.
